Instruction: Press tofu to remove excess water and crumble into a food processor.
Add soy milk, nutritional yeast, Dijon mustard, salt, and pepper to the food processor. Blend until smooth.
Saut√© onion and garlic in a skillet until softened. Add broccoli and cook until tender.
Combine tofu mixture with broccoli and onion mixture.
Pour mixture into premade pie crust.
Bake for 35-40 minutes, or until golden brown and set.
